name: Pointless Game (Early Access) [CANCELED]
description:
WARNING: VERY POINTLESS

How i can describe that??? Ummm.. you're an weird robot...and....you have nothing to do...maybe in later updates this game will be better....

Umm... and you can play with XBOX controller...
